data.actual_result: Blue banner is stuck and says "X new messages since 6:00pm"
data.expected_result: Blue banner disappears upon reentering the channel
data.short_description: Switching channels when a bot sends an unread message causes a stuck new messages banner to appear
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can use a bot that will invoke a response (I used Mantaro's trivia) - Invoke a command that you can respond to (Optional only if you use a bot like Mantaro) - Scroll up in the channel a little bit - Invoke a response from the bot - Make sure that the blue "New Messages" banner is on your screen - Switch channels without letting the blue banner disappear - Switch back to the first channel and observe the blue banner
